title: Trade deal investments of $100 billion will be achieved well before 15-year deadline, says Iceland’s Ambassador to India
description:
The four countries of the European Free Trade Association (EFTA) will meet the target of investing $100 billion in India well before the 15-year deadline as set out in the trade deal signed between India and the grouping, Iceland’s Ambassador to India Benedikt Höskuldsson told The Hindu.

The Trade ...
